Name: Addis Ababa
Description: The capital city of Ethiopia, serving as the economic and political center.

Name: Afar Region
Description: A region in northeastern Ethiopia, known for its desert landscapes and the Danakil Depression.

Name: Amhara Region
Description: A region known for its historical sites, including Lalibela and Bahir Dar.

Name: Benishangul-Gumuz Region
Description: A region in western Ethiopia, home to diverse ethnic groups and the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam.

Name: Dire Dawa
Description: A chartered city known for its railway connections and diverse culture.

Name: Gambela Region
Description: A region in western Ethiopia, home to the Nuer and Anuak people.

Name: Harari Region
Description: A small region with a rich Islamic heritage and the historic city of Harar.

Name: Oromia Region
Description: The largest region in Ethiopia, known for agriculture and diverse ethnic groups.

Name: Sidama Region
Description: A region known for its coffee production and lush landscapes.

Name: Somali Region
Description: A region in eastern Ethiopia, inhabited mostly by ethnic Somalis.

Name: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples Region (SNNPR)
Description: A culturally diverse region in southern Ethiopia.

Name: Tigray Region
Description: A northern region known for its historical sites, including Aksum.
